questionTitle: This young tree could not have been damaged by accident: I believe it was done ________.
I'm afraid I've got ________ my doctor today.
I'd ________ the operation unless it is absolutely necessary.
The brakes need ________.
If it ________ rain, we'll have the party outside.
A few of ________ are planning to drive to Florida during spring break.
Please go to ________ to pick up your ID card .
It is a beautiful car, but it is not ________ the price that I paid for it.
I don't think he'll ever ________ the shock of his wife's death.
The child hurt himself badly when he fell ________ the bedroom window.
He ________ me to buy my air ticket immediately or it would be too late.
He got out of bed and took a few ________ but couldn't go any farther.
His performance was ________; the audience was delighted .
I'm sure I'll find a way of getting ________ their objections.
The High Street is so narrow that the Council have decided to ________ it.
A box in which a dead person is buried is a ________.
Most of us like ________ to the see in summer.
I ________ the hot weather in Thailand .
It's ________ a nice day ________ we should do something. Then, let's go out swimming.
The firm went bankrupt and their shares became ________.
